name: DriveSafe-Car Sim
description:
This is a proof of concept of a driving simulator designed to help educate young drivers on some of the consequences of risky driving. 

it features real-world information on the fines associated with speeding, running traffic lights, and failing to stop at stop signs in Queensland, Australia.

In the full game:

Drivesafe will have other AI drivers on the road, additional signs and Vr and controller support.
